name: declarative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving knowledge or facts: Sleep is important for declarative memory. Kids may be a long way through school before they make a final, declarative choice of what path to follow professionally.
relating to or involving an announcement, often one that is written and official: In his public appearances, he dresses informally and makes simple, bold declarative statements. In public, all her speeches are bold and declarative. Related word
declaration
More examplesFewer examplesThe words he uses are descriptive, plain, and declarative.Declarative memory involves knowledge of facts, whereas procedural memory involves knowledge of how to do something.He made a bold declarative statement about the war, but his decision was wrong.The police offered a declarative denial about what had happened.
